channel.title: Help With my Serv!
channel.description:
Hey, I just downloaded Deception [code]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,474816.0.html[/code]
And it is all separated, instead of a giant client.java ......
So my problem is I can't find [code]if (Server.equals("xxxxxxxxxx") || Server.equals("localhost")) { return 1; } else if (Server.equals("xxxxxxxxxxx")) { return 2;[/code] Can't find this either: [code]playerServer = "xxxxxxxxxxxx";[/code]
Anyone have any idea where to find it?
Btw before starting to flame I changed a lot, will continue changing and I will also give creds to source creator.
Ty,
Vrac
Btw it says something like server is unresponsive and please try again in a minute....

item.title: Help With my Serv!
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

Use the search bar: 0.0.0.0, Localhost, “” ( it could be blank), 127.0.0.1…

It has to be found using the search bar >__>

Read full topic

item.title: Help With my Serv!
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

Didn’t work ; can’t find it -.-

Anyone else???

item.title: Help With my Serv!
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

try searching for “localhost” , “127.0.0.1” in client.java. also look for gui.java and scrool 3 pages down till you see something that looks like "Serverip = " now open client.java client side and look for something like this:

“Gui.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, “Kz123.no-ip.biz”, “kz321.no-ip.biz”, 1);”

goodluck. ill be here if you need me

Read full topic

item.title: Help With my Serv!
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

Hey, I just downloaded Deception

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,474816.0.html

And it is all separated, instead of a giant client.java …

So my problem is I can’t find

if (Server.equals("xxxxxxxxxx") || Server.equals("localhost")) { return 1; } else if (Server.equals("xxxxxxxxxxx")) { return 2;
Can’t find this either:

playerServer = "xxxxxxxxxxxx";

Anyone have any idea where to find it?

Btw before starting to flame I changed a lot, will continue changing and I will also give creds to source creator.

Ty,

Vrac

Btw it says something like server is unresponsive and please try again in a minute…

Read full topic
